rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0001
rows.name:
Ahahah. Ahh, this is the life. The wind
on your face, the air in your lungs...

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0002
rows.name:
It feels like freedom! This kind of place
makes you glad to be alive.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0003
rows.name:
What are you saying? You talk like you
aren't always free to do as you please.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0004
rows.name:
Hissss! Issss something wrong with your
eyes? Does this look like freedom
to you?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0005
rows.name:
Following a group of brats and Nopon
like a teacher on a school outing?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0006
rows.name: You do it because you like them, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0007
rows.name:
*cackle* LIKE them?
I do it because I have no choice!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0008
rows.name: Gahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0009
rows.name: You seem to enjoy it anyway!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0010
rows.name:
Maybe something IS
wrong with your eyes!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0011
rows.name: You're pretty talkative today, Zantetsu.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0012
rows.name: You're talkative today, Zantetsu.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0013
rows.name: You're rather talkative today, Zantetsu.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0014
rows.name: You're jolly talkative today, Zantetsu.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0015
rows.name:
You think? Hehe...
I suppose I'm just in a good mood.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0016
rows.name:
Talkative or not, I'm always keeping
a watchful eye over everyone.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0017
rows.name:
Hah, good one! More like you're
always wandering around doing
your own thing!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0018
rows.name:
You've always got something to
shout back at me, haven't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0019
rows.name: Waaah!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0020
rows.name: Let's ask Zantetsu something.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0021
rows.name:
Do you dislike having to
worry about others?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0022
rows.name: Why do you prefer being alone?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0023
rows.name: Let's ask Zantetsu something.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0024
rows.name: Do you hate being around us?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0025
rows.name: Why do you prefer being alone?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0026
rows.name: Let's ask Zantetsu something.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0027
rows.name: Do you hate caring for others?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0028
rows.name: Why do you prefer your own company?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0029
rows.name: Let's ask Zantetsu something.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0030
rows.name: Do you just hate other people?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0031
rows.name: Why d'you like doing your own thing?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0101
rows.name:
Hmph, well to be honest I've never
liked being part of a large group.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0102
rows.name: Others are just an unnecessary burden.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0103
rows.name:
So we should just leave you behind?
You'd be lost without us, admit it!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0104
rows.name:
It's important that your Driver
be able to keep an eye on you.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0105
rows.name: How rude... Jerk.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0106
rows.name:
Why don't we leave YOU behind? I'm
sure it would be fun to watch you rage.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0107
rows.name:
Waaaah!
You wouldn't do that!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0108
rows.name:
Ahaha, you guys argue so much
but I can tell you're good friends.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0109
rows.name:
Ahaha, you guys argue so much
but I can tell you're good friends.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0110
rows.name:
Heh, you guys argue so much
but in truth you're good friends.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0111
rows.name:
You fellas argue so much, but you're
really good friends, aren't ya?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0112
rows.name:
What?
Are you serious?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0113
rows.name: This oaf is no friend of mine!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0114
rows.name:
At least we agree on something! I'd
rather be friends with an Igna!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0115
rows.name:
Yeah? You're one to talk, you
Gogol-faced buffoon!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0116
rows.name:
Waaaah!
I'm stronger than a Gogol!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0117
rows.name: Oh. Whatever you say.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0118
rows.name:
At any rate, I'm just going to
continue doing as I please.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0119
rows.name:
As long as I find this place tolerable,
I'll keep on lending my services to you.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0120
rows.name: I expect the same from you, Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0201
rows.name:
Alone is just easier.
Nobody to burden you.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0202
rows.name:
Besides, the phrase "lone wolf"
has something of a ring to it.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0203
rows.name:
You're a Blade, though.
You can't just survive
on your own like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0204
rows.name: You don't think I know that?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0205
rows.name:
Do you feel like we're
holding you back?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0206
rows.name:
So you feel like we're
just holding you back.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0207
rows.name:
You mean to say that we
are just holding you back?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0208
rows.name: What, so we're just holding you back?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0209
rows.name:
Hmm?
No, not at all!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0210
rows.name: No need to go cry about it.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0211
rows.name:
It's all fine. I don't have any particular
objection to being around you.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0212
rows.name: And I certainly don't feel held back.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0213
rows.name:
If anything, it's rather enjoyable...
Hehehe...

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0214
rows.name:
It's as Ootsuchi says.
Without a Driver, I
cannot continue living.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0215
rows.name: I envy those who are able to live alone.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0216
rows.name: That's all I meant.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0217
rows.name:
You don't need to concern
yourselves over me. Got it?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0218
rows.name:
Gahaha!
You're a character, Zantetsu.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0219
rows.name:
Shut up, you!
That counts as concerning yourself!
